languages.text: "Надо заменить только одного спутника — это небольшая перестановка. Кроме того, я отвечаю не только за захват Саргоны, но и за ваше выживание".
"Only one of your escort needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."
languages.original_text: "Надо заменить только одного спутника — это небольшая перестановка. Кроме того, я отвечаю не только за захват Саргоны, но и за ваше выживание".

traits.locale_text: "Only one companion needs to be replaced, it is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."
"Only one companion needs to be replaced, it is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."
"Only one companion needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."
"Only one companion needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."
"Only one of your escort needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."
"Only one of your escort needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."

languages.text: «Solo debo reemplazar a un miembro de su séquito. Es un cambio menor. Además, mi responsabilidad no se limita a capturar a Sargona: también debo velar por su seguridad».
languages.original_text: "Only one of your escort needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."

traits.locale_text: «Solo debo reemplazar a un miembro de su séquito. Es un cambio menor. Además, mi responsabilidad no se limita a capturar a Sargona: también debo velar por su seguridad».

languages.text: “只要替换掉其中一名随行人员就好，仅仅是小小的人员变动而已。毕竟，我不仅要确保抓获萨戈纳，也要为你的人身安全负责。”
languages.original_text: "Only one of your escort needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."

traits.locale_text: “只要替换掉其中一名随行人员就好，仅仅是小小的人员变动而已。毕竟，我不仅要确保抓获萨戈纳，也要为你的人身安全负责。”

languages.text: 「従者の一人だけを交代させれば十分です。それは些細な変更に過ぎません。さらに、私はサルゴナの捕縛だけでなく、あなたの生存にも責任があります」
languages.original_text: "Only one of your escort needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."

traits.locale_text: 「従者の一人だけを交代させれば十分です。それは些細な変更に過ぎません。さらに、私はサルゴナの捕縛だけでなく、あなたの生存にも責任があります」

languages.text: "Es muss nur ein Mitglied Eurer Eskorte ersetzt werden. Ein geringfügiger Austausch. Außerdem bin ich nicht nur für Sargonas Gefangennahme, sondern auch für Euer Überleben verantwortlich."
languages.original_text: "Only one of your escort needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."

traits.locale_text: "Es muss nur ein Mitglied Eurer Eskorte ersetzt werden. Ein geringfügiger Austausch. Außerdem bin ich nicht nur für Sargonas Gefangennahme, sondern auch für Euer Überleben verantwortlich."

languages.text: « Un seul membre de votre escorte manquera à l'appel. Autant dire que vous verrez à peine la différence. Sans compter que je ne suis pas seulement responsable de la capture de Sargona, mais aussi de votre propre vie. »
languages.original_text: "Only one of your escort needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."

traits.locale_text: « Un seul membre de votre escorte manquera à l'appel. Autant dire que vous verrez à peine la différence. Sans compter que je ne suis pas seulement responsable de la capture de Sargona, mais aussi de votre propre vie. »

languages.text: "Yalnızca refakatçilerinizden biriyle yer değiştireceğim. Ufak bir değişiklik. Ayrıca yalnızca Sargona'yı yakalamakla değil, canınızı korumakla da mükellefim."
languages.original_text: "Only one of your escort needs to be replaced. It is a minor permutation. Furthermore, I am responsible not only for Sargona's capture, but also for your survival."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca refakatçilerinizden biriyle yer değiştireceğim. Ufak bir değişiklik. Ayrıca yalnızca Sargona'yı yakalamakla değil, canınızı korumakla da mükellefim."
